= Graph Search Agent =
An agent that performs graph search using the selection-astar default rules.  This approach can be modified to use any of the different selection approaches.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application, Semantic Memory
